file.name: openapi.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.0
info:
  title: '{{title}}'
  version: '1.0'
paths:
  /welcome:
    get:
      operationId: fakeapi.foo_bar.search
      parameters:
        - name: foo
          in: query
          schema:
            type: integer
            default: somestring
      responses:
        '200':
          description: search
          content:
            '*/*':
              schema:
                type: object
servers:
  - url: /v1.0

Error: parse: paths: /welcome: get: fakeapi.foo_bar.search: parameters: parse parameter "foo": schema: parse default: expected type "integer", got "string"
